title: Did one of the survivors of Parkland's shooting say, 'The generation before us doesn't know what it feels like to be shot by AR-15s?'
subtitle: A number of outlets used a fake quote to portray David Hogg as ignorant in history.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: David Hogg said that the generations that came before him didn't know what it was like to get shot by AR-15s.
